blocks.name: cga
blocks.content: Extend class definition to include the class of group actions.
blocks.origin: const class cga { GrpAct }

blocks.name: diff.cga.s
diff.cga.c
diff.cga.w
df-ga
blocks.content: Define the class of all group actions. A group ` G ` acts on a set ` S ` if a permutation on ` S ` is associated with every element of ` G ` in such a way that the identity permutation on ` S ` is associated with the neutral element of ` G ` , and the composition of the permutations associated with two elements of ` G ` is identical with the permutation associated with the composition of these two elements (in the same order) in the group ` G ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Aug-2009.)

blocks.name: isga
blocks.content: The predicate "is a (left) group action." The group ` G ` is said to act on the base set ` Y ` of the action, which is not assumed to have any special properties. There is a related notion of right group action, but as the Wikipedia article explains, it is not mathematically interesting. The way actions are usually thought of is that each element ` g ` of ` G ` is a permutation of the elements of ` Y ` (see ~ gapm ). Since group theory was classically about symmetry groups, it is therefore likely that the notion of group action was useful even in early group theory. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)

blocks.content: The trivial action of a group on any set. Each group element corresponds to the identity permutation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Aug-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: subgga
blocks.content: A subgroup acts on its parent group. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Aug-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)

thm subgga(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c3[GrpAct]c4))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c1[|`s]c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c2 ‚àà(c3[GrpAct]c4), (c3 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c4 ‚àà ùïå), ((c2 :((Base ` c3)√ó c4)‚Üí c4)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(((0 ` c3)[c2]hs0)= hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c3),((hs1[(+ ` c3)]hs2)[c2]hs0)=(hs1[c2](hs2[c2]hs0))))))))
  jctir(c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c3 ‚àà Grp, c4 ‚àà ùïå)

blocks.name: gass
blocks.content: A subset of a group action is a group action iff it is closed under the group action operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: gasubg
blocks.content: The restriction of a group action to a subgroup is a group action. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: gaid2
blocks.content: A group operation is a left group action of the group on itself. (Contributed by FL, 17-May-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gaid2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cga, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  eleqtrd(c1, co(c0, cga, c2), co(co(c0, cress, c2), cga, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(co(c0, cress, c2), cga, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  subgid(c0, c2)
  subgga(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, co(c0, cress, c2), c2, c3)
  eqid(co(c0, cress, c2))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cress, c2), cga, c2, c0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ressid(c0, cgrp, c2)
}

thm gaid2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c0[GrpAct]c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c3]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  eleqtrd(c1, (c0[GrpAct]c2), ((c0[|`s]c2)[GrpAct]c2), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  syl(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà((c0[|`s]c2)[GrpAct]c2), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  subgid(c0, c2)
  subgga(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, (c0[|`s]c2), c2, c3)
  eqid((c0[|`s]c2))
  oveq1d((c0[|`s]c2), cga, c2, c0, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ressid(c0, cgrp, c2)
}

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)))
  gagrp(c0, c1, c2)
  grpinvcl(c1, c3, c4, cfv(cminusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c1))

  gaass(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c3), c4, c3, c6, cfv(cplusg, c1))

blocks.name: gacan
blocks.content: Group inverses cancel in a group action. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gacan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c3, c0, c5), c6), wceq(co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6), c5)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cminusg, c1))
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wceq(co(c3, c0, c5), c6), wceq(co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6), c5), wceq(c5, co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6)))

  eqeq2d(co(c3, c0, c5), co(c3, c0, co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6)), c6, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))))
  3eqtr3d(co(c3, c0, co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6)), c6, co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c7, c3)), c0, c6), co(cfv(c0g, c1), c0, c6), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))))
  oveq1d(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c7, c3)), c0, c6, cfv(c0g, c1), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c7, c3)), cfv(c0g, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4))
  grprinv(c1, c3, c4, cfv(cplusg, c1), c7, cfv(c0g, c1))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c7, c3)), c0, c6), co(c3, c0, co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cfv(c7, c3), c4), wcel(c6, c2))
  gaass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(c7, c3), c6, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c1), c0, c6), c6), wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c6, c2))
  gagrpid(c0, c1, c2, c6, cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c3, c0, c5), co(c3, c0, co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6))), wceq(c5, co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2)))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))
  fovrnd(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6, c2, c4, c2, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2)), wf(c0, cxp(c4, c2), c2))
  gaf(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2))), wcel(cfv(c7, c3), c4), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c6, c2)), wcel(c1, cgrp))

  eqcom(c5, co(cfv(c7, c3), c0, c6))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c3[c0]c5)= c6 ‚Üî((c7 ` c3)[c0]c6)= c5))

  oveq1d((c3[(+ ` c1)](c7 ` c3)), c0, c6, (0 ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c2)))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c2)), (c3[(+ ` c1)](c7 ` c3))=(0 ` c1), c1 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà c4)
  grprinv(c1, c3, c4, (+ ` c1), c7, (0 ` c1))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c2)), ((c3[(+ ` c1)](c7 ` c3))[c0]c6)=(c3[c0]((c7 ` c3)[c0]c6)), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2), c3 ‚àà c4, (c7 ` c3)‚àà c4, c6 ‚àà c2)

  gagrpid(c0, c1, c2, c6, (0 ` c1))

  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c2)), ((c3[c0]c5)=(c3[c0]((c7 ` c3)[c0]c6))‚Üî c5 =((c7 ` c3)[c0]c6)), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c2, ((c7 ` c3)[c0]c6)‚àà c2)

blocks.name: gapm
blocks.content: The action of a particular group element is a permutation of the base set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Aug-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gapm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wf1o(c5, c2, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  f1o2d(s0, hs0, c5, c2, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c3), c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)))
  fovrnd(c3, c0, cv(s0), c2, c4, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wf(c0, cxp(c4, c2), c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  fovrnd(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c3), c0, cv(hs0), c2, c4, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wf(c0, cxp(c4, c2), c2))

blocks.name: gaorb
blocks.content: The orbit equivalence relation puts two points in the group action in the same equivalence class iff there is a group element that takes one element to the other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: gaorber
blocks.content: The orbit equivalence relation is an equivalence relation on the target set of the group action. (Contributed by NM, 11-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)

  ‚ä£ c4 = { s0 ‚àà c5 |(s0[c0]c3)= c3 }

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)

  mpbir3and((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c4 ‚äÜ c5, c4 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c4,(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c4)‚àß((invg ` c1)` hs0)‚àà c4)))

  jca(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c4,(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c4), ((invg ` c1)` hs0)‚àà c4)
  ralrimiva(hs1, c4, ((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c4)
  anassrs((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà c4, hs1 ‚àà c4, (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c4)
  sylanbrc(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c4)), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c4, (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c5, ((hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)[c0]c3)= c3)
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c4)), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c5, c1 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c5, hs1 ‚àà c5)
  syl(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c4)), c1 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2))
  grpcl(c1, hs0, c5, hs1, (+ ` c1))

blocks.content: Write the coset relation for the stabilizer subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)

thm gastacos(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wb(wbr(c4, c7, c6), wceq(co(c4, c0, c3), co(c6, c0, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c8, crab(s0, c5, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c3), c3)))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c1, cqg, c8))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  3bitr2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wbr(c4, c7, c6), wceq(co(c4, c0, c3), co(c6, c0, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8))
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wbr(c4, c7, c6), wa(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8)), w3a(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wb(wbr(c4, c7, c6), w3a(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8))), wcel(c1, cgrp), wss(c8, c5))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wss(c8, c5), wcel(c8, cfv(csubg, c1)))

  eqgval(c1, cgrp, c8, c5, c4, c7, c6, cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  df-3an(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8))
  biantrurd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)))
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8), wceq(co(c4, c0, c3), co(c6, c0, c3)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), c3), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c0, co(c6, c0, c3)), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), c3, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c0, co(c6, c0, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))))
  syl13anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c0, co(c6, c0, c3))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c5), wcel(c6, c5), wcel(c3, c2))
  gaass(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c5, c6, c3, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wb(wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), c3)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c5))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c5), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c5), wcel(c6, c5))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c5), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c8, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)), wcel(c8, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  gastacl(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c8, c5)
  subgrcl(c8, c1)
  grpinvcl(c1, c4, c5, cfv(cminusg, c1))
  grpcl(c1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c5, c6, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  baib(wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c5), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), c3))
  elrab2(s0, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c8, c5, wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c3), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c0, c3), c3, co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), wceq(cv(s0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3)
  syl13anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wb(wceq(co(c4, c0, c3), co(c6, c0, c3)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), c0, co(c6, c0, c3)), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c6, c0, c3), c2))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))
  fovrnd(c6, c0, c3, c2, c5, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))), wf(c0, cxp(c5, c2), c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)))
  gaf(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5))
  simplr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)))
  gacan(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c3, co(c6, c0, c3), cfv(cminusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c4), cfv(cplusg, c1), c6), c0, c3), c3)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfv(cminusg, c1), c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cminusg, c1)

  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c5 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c5))‚Üí(c4[c7]c6 ‚Üî(c4[c0]c3)=(c6[c0]c3)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c1)

  syl(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c5 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c5)), c8 ‚äÜ c5, c8 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  subgss(c8, c1, c5)

  df-3an(c4 ‚àà c5, c6 ‚àà c5, (((invg ` c1)` c4)[(+ ` c1)]c6)‚àà c8)
  biantrurd(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c5 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c5)), (((invg ` c1)` c4)[(+ ` c1)]c6)‚àà c8, (c4 ‚àà c5 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c5))
  simpr((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpAct]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 ‚àà c5 ‚àß c6 ‚àà c5))

blocks.name: orbsta
blocks.content: The Orbit-Stabilizer theorem. The mapping ` F ` is a bijection from the cosets of the stabilizer subgroup of ` A ` to the orbit of ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: orbsta2
blocks.content: Relation between the size of the orbit and the size of the stabilizer of a point in a finite group action. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm orbsta2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)), wceq(cfv(chash, c4), co(cfv(chash, cec(c3, c5)), cmul, cfv(chash, c6))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, crab(s0, c4, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c3), c3)))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c1, cqg, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, copab(s1, s2, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c2), wrex(s3, c4, wceq(co(cv(s3), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)

  -| diffsc(s1, c7)

  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c7)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, c4), co(cfv(chash, cec(c3, c5)), cmul, cfv(chash, c6)), co(cfv(chash, cqs(c4, c7)), cmul, cfv(chash, c6)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)))

  oveq1d(cfv(chash, cqs(c4, c7)), cmul, cfv(chash, c6), cfv(chash, cec(c3, c5)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)))
  hasheqf1od(cqs(c4, c7), cec(c3, c5), cfn, crn(cmpt(hs0, c4, cop(cec(cv(hs0), c7), co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)))
  ssfid(cqs(c4, c7), cpw(c4), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)), wcel(cpw(c4), cfn), wcel(c4, cfn))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn))
  pwfi(c4)

  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)), wer(c7, c4), wcel(c6, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cga, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn), wcel(c6, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  gastacl(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c4)
